participant_1.background:
My job allows me to be myself and be creative.
I'm an animal lover who spends my free time learning more about nature and the environment.

I'm distant with my family, but I'd like to be closer to them.
i enjoy ice cream.

participant_2.background:
I'm going to re-read Anne of Green Gables, but I won't be sharing it with my mom.
I enjoy video games but I wish I were closer to my family.
i was born in san francisco.
my favorite thing to do is to read books on the beach.
music has always been my number one passion.

content.text: Hi! I'm re-reading Anne of Green Gables. Have you read it?
No I haven't, but I've heard good things about it.
It's really good. It's a coming of age story about a young orphan girl who gets adopted by an older couple.
That sounds interesting. I might have to check it out.
I was born in San Francisco, but I've lived in a few different places since then.
Oh cool. I've always wanted to visit San Francisco.
It's a great city. You should definitely go sometime.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, play video games, and go to the beach.
Me too! I love reading and video games. I don't go to the beach as much as I'd like to, but I love it when I do.
What are your favorite books and video games?
My favorite books are the Harry Potter series and the Hunger Games series. My favorite video games are The Legend of Zelda and Mario Kart.
I love Harry Potter! And I've heard good things about the Hunger Games. I've never played The Legend of Zelda or Mario Kart, but I've heard good things about them too.
You should definitely check them out! They're all really great.
